Platinum

Platinum

Name: Platinum

Formula: Pt

Atomic Number: 78

Group: 10

Block: d

Period: 6

Relative Atomic Mass: 195.084

Discovery Date: 1750

Appearance: A shiny, silvery-white metal.

Uses: Jewellery, catalytic converters for vehicles,computer hard disks, optical fibres, chemotherapy drugs.

Atomic Structure:
